elements.title: Through this workshop, I feel prepared to use the Problem Solving Process for Programming to reinforce persistence and support students when facing challenges.

elements.name: csp_unit10_project_buy_in_m7

elements.title: I had opportunities to discuss teaching strategies with peers during this module.

elements.name: csdpilot_cs_concepts_for_teaching_m7
elements.title: As a result of this workshop, I feel confident about the computer science concepts I need to master before teaching CS Discoveries next week.

elements.name: find_resources_m7
elements.visibleIf: ({workshop_course}='CS Discoveries' and {workshop_id} <> '12273' and {workshop_id} <> '12786' and {workshop_id} <> '13094') or {workshop_course}='CS Principles'
elements.title: I know where to find resources to help me teach the units we have covered.

elements.name: next_steps_commitment_m7
elements.title: As a result of this workshop series, I feel empowered to take next steps to implement my commitment to foster equitable access, diversity, and inclusion in my CS classroom.

elements.name: plan_measure_m7
elements.title: I know how to track the progress of my commitment to ensuring my CS classroom is equitable and inclusive.

elements.name: resources_equity_m7
elements.title: Through the academic year workshops, I now know where to find information and resources to implement my commitment to foster an equitable and inclusive CS classroom.
